body.p:
Grayson Carter Co Ky
Feby 1st 1861
Hon F Maggoffin Gov of Ky
Dear Sir

Please find enclosed the Statements in my Case of the Co Atty and if you will take the trouble Sinclair Roberts the Rep from Lawrence will tell you all about as he was at the Trial and is known to all the the facts in the case
Hoping your honor will Remit the fine and that I may hear from you soon

I remain Yours Truly
C. E. Hood
Grayson Carter Co Ky
